titleStmt.title: A brief apologie for all nonsubscribers, and looking-glasse for all apostate perjured prescribers & subscribers of the new engagement wherein they may clearly behold their presidents, sin, horrour, punishment.
titleStmt.author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.

notesStmt.note: Written by W. Prynne. Cf. Wing.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
